This particular model that supports 14- to 18-inch laptops hit the scene last year carrying a $180 price tag. It has held firm at full price since its debut until now, and today’s offer at Amazon lands as its first deal that shaves $20 off its usual going rate. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this unit, making this a great time cash in and snag one for your laptop. Head below for more details.

items.title: Expand your M4 Mac mini’s storage and I/O with ORICO’s MiniLink hub, now just $36
items.summary:
ORICO MiniLink M4 Mac mini SATA SSD Hub

Buy for $36 (Reg. $60)

Clip the on-page 40% off coupon.

What we love

First things first, this is hub accepts SATA SSDs, not NVMe. So we want to get that out of the way. This typically means that data transfer speeds won’t be as fast and that you’ll need to specifically buy a SATA SSD. That said, it’s a very affordable and sleek way to expand an M4 Mac mini without breaking the bank.

ESR 15W Qi2 3-in-1 charging station

Buy for $18 (Reg. $36.50)

Enter promo code I9NCH4GV for $17.99 off.

What we love

You’ll come across plenty of Qi2-certified chargers on the market – including some of the newer 25W Qi2.2 options – but it’s rare to find one with such a steep discount. This is easily among the most affordable Qi2 chargers around at the moment, and it offers a 15W Qi2 wireless pad with MagSafe support for your iPhone, along with dedicated spots to charge your Apple Watch and AirPods. It’s a solid charging station overall for Apple users looking to get a new charging station up and running at their desk.
